text: int main ( void ) { int t , n , i , j , pos ; long long int sum , pro , count ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; count = 0 ; long long int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i += pos ) { pos = 1 ; for ( j = i ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j ] <= a [ j + 1 ] ) { pos ++ ; } else break ; } count += pos * ( pos + 1 ) / 2 ; } printf ( "%lld\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
